Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel(n).(n)

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda.

programme.title: A Dirty Shame
programme.desc: A bump on the head transforms a sexually repressed housewife into a sex-addicted exhibitionist - who, finding her husband can no longer fulfil her needs, goes in search of satisfaction in Baltimore's seedy underworld. John Waters' comedy, starring Tracey Ullman, Johnny Knoxville, Selma Blair and Chris Isaak.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck boxing coach nurses a grudge because his best fighter has abandoned him for the big time. When a 31-year-old waitress turns up asking him to train her, he refuses outright. However, her persistence wins him round and the pair go on to form a strong professional partnership and successful career. Oscar-winning drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Hilary Swank, Morgan Freeman and Anthony Mackie.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket
programme.desc: Raw recruits undergo harsh training under a domineering Marine drill sergeant after being called up for service in the Vietnam War, but his brutal methods lead to the breakdown of one of his cadets. Eventually, some of the fully trained soldiers get their first taste of combat in 1968. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio and R Lee Ermey.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original(n).(n)

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson(n).(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis(n).(n)

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: An angry teenage social outcast rejects any form of authority in his search for a sense of identity. Eventually, he finds solace in the company of two like-minded and equally alienated misfits. However, a spate of violent confrontations forces them to go on the run, and their plan to stay in hiding has tragic consequences. Drama, starring James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo and Jim Backus(n).(n)

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane(n).(n)

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone(n).(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Aspiring painter Margaret Keane marries a controlling man who sells her artwork. As the paintings of large-eyed children grow tremendously popular, Margaret discovers he is claiming to have painted them himself, and she and her daughter are forced to live a lie for years - until she finally resolves to prove his deceit in court. Tim Burton's fact-based drama, starring Amy Adams, Christoph Waltz and Terence Stamp(n).(n)

programme.title: Amadeus: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of a young Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent, and as jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Extended cut of Milos Forman's period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce(n).(n)

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: In 1965, amidst an atmosphere of racial unrest, civil rights campaigner Dr Martin Luther King Jr plans a peaceful march across Alabama from Selma to Montgomery. His goal is to persuade President Lyndon B Johnson to change the law, allowing black people to register to vote. Fact-based drama, starring David Oyelowo, Tom Wilkinson and Carmen Ejogo(n).(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp(n).(n)

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth(n).(n)

programme.title: Room 237
programme.desc: Documentary in which five fans of Stanley Kubrick's horror movie The Shining analyse the film's imagery and share their differing theories on hidden messages they believe the director planted, ranging from metaphors for genocide or government conspiracy, to a confession from Kubrick of faking the moon landings.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: A boy starts a new school determined to be popular and admired, only to find himself instead a target for bullies. He documents his experiences in a journal as he sets out on a series of attempts to gain the respect he feels he deserves - but his every effort ends in disaster. Family comedy, with Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron and Chloe Grace Moretz.

programme.title: Tooth
programme.desc: A rebellious tooth fairy grows tired of her daily coin-collecting duties and decides to deposit a hefty sum of cash in the home of a young girl and her brother. However, she discovers her actions have jeopardised the plans for Christmas in her homeland of Fairytopia. Children's fantasy adventure, starring Yasmin Paige, Harry Enfield, Richard E Grant, Jim Broadbent and Stephen Fry.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A clumsy security guard is critically injured during a run-in with a thief, so his cybernetics-expert employer transforms him into the ultimate crime-fighting machine - a bionic officer with an array of gadgets and weaponry cunningly concealed inside his body. Disney comedy adventure based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett and Joely Fisher.

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: A con-woman acquires an executive's credit card numbers, and lives a life of luxury at his expense. The outraged victim sets out on a mission to track down the fraudster and bring her to justice personally - resulting in them travelling on a disastrous road trip across America together. Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau and Amanda Peet.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: A 15th-century Transylvanian knight becomes a vampire after the death of his beloved wife. Centuries later, he learns she has been reincarnated, and travels to Victorian London with the intent of seducing her into joining him in living death. Francis Ford Coppola's Gothic horror based on the novel, starring Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins and Keanu Reeves.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A writer struggling to complete the script for a movie about psychopathic killers turns to his criminal friends for advice. He ends up getting more than he bargained for when the small-time crooks kidnap a dog that belongs to a gangster, putting all their lives in danger. Comedy thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Sam Rockwell, Christopher Walken and Woody Harrelson(n).(n)

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: An American Civil War veteran, twisted by his experiences during the conflict, becomes the judge of a small town. He embarks on a reign of terror, ruthlessly misusing his power, and it falls to an old friend from his army days to bring him down. Western, starring Glenn Ford, William Holden, Ellen Drew and Ray Collins(n).(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick(n).(n)

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager spends the summer in a lake house with his family, where he finds an invasion force of tiny aliens lurking in the attic. The extraterrestrials plan to take over the world with a mind-controlling device - and since it only works on adults, it falls to the boy and his siblings to save the day. Children's sci-fi comedy, with Carter Jenkins and Austin Butler(n).(n)

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: A boy at a scout camp on an island falls in love with the daughter of a local family, and they run away together. The search for the missing children throws the peaceful community into an uproar, leaving various adults troubled by their own lost innocence. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, with Bruce Willis, Edward Norton, Bill Murray and Frances McDormand(n).(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film(n).(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the assassins targeted is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton(n).(n)

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: A carefree Lothario attends his brother's wedding with the intention of stopping the ceremony. However, he receives a visit from his uncle's ghost, who warns him that the spirits of his past romances will make their presence felt, in a bid to show him where his life has gone wrong. Romantic comedy, starring Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner and Michael Douglas(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A meteorite lands in the Baldwin sisters' recipe room, causing quite a stir among the locals who believe it to be a heaven-sent omen of hope.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A minister comes to stay with the Waltons, but his presence soon sparks off all manner of religious ructions.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls family faces yet more tribulation as Mary's eyesight deteriorates. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary becomes bitter about losing her sight, prompting Charles to enrol her in a school for the blind.

programme.title: A Father's Betrayal
programme.desc: A respected senior attorney faces accusations of rape against a friend of his son, who is also a lawyer, leading to professional and personal conflicts in the family as his nearest and dearest are caught up in the controversial case. Drama, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy, with Lynn Redgrave, Reed Diamond, Alice Krige and Michael David Simms.

programme.title: Brave New Girl
programme.desc: A teenage girl struggles to realise her dreams of stardom while trying to shake off the shackles of her humble Texas upbringing. Fortunately, she has her mother behind her, offering encouragement when the going gets tough. Family drama, based on the book A Mother's Gift by Britney and Lynne Spears, starring Lindsey Haun, Virginia Madsen and Jackie Rosenbaum.

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.

programme.title: Mayflower Madam
programme.desc: Fact-based drama based on the life of former debutante Sydney Biddle Barrows, a descendent of the Mayflower pilgrims, who became notorious as the proprietor of a high-class New York escort agency. Candice Bergen, Chris Sarandon and Chita Rivera star.

programme.title: Remembrance of Love
programme.desc: A widowed concentration camp survivor searches for the woman he loved and lost as a teenager during the Holocaust. Romantic drama, with Pam Dawber and Chana Eden.

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem.

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.

programme.title: Reflections on a Crime
programme.desc: A prison guard begins a friendship with a woman awaiting execution for the murder of her husband, little anticipating the amazing tale she will reveal to him on the night before she dies. Thriller, starring Mimi Rogers, Billy Zane, John Terry and Kurt Fuller.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children prevent an injured orphan from killing a raccoon and take him under their wing - but soon wonder whether they have made the right decision(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and the family are puzzled by the cold manner of their new neighbours - until it comes to light that they suffered at the hands of the Nazis and are still afraid to reveal their ancestry(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger arrives in town, planning to stay in a burnt-out house, and encounters nothing but hostility from the locals, even though she is friendly toward Laura and her pals(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Mary embark on a disappointing trip to Chicago, where romantic problems and union officials spoil their enjoyment(n).(n)

programme.title: The Price of a Broken Heart
programme.desc: A woman learns her husband has been having an affair with his secretary for years and plans to abandon his family for her. The spurned wife responds by suing her husband's lover for $1million under a long-forgotten state law - resulting in a case that has far-reaching consequences for American divorce law. Fact-based drama, starring Laura Innes, Park Overall and Timothy Carhart(n).(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes(n).(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Beatles

programme.title: Telling Secrets
programme.desc: Part one of two. A woman is shocked to learn of her husband's infidelity, and her reaction leaves a lot to be desired as she vows to hunt down the other woman and kill her. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd, Ken Olin and Christopher McDonald(n).(n)

programme.title: Snap Decision
programme.desc: An internet designer becomes embroiled in a legal nightmare when photographs of her semi-naked children are deemed to be inappropriate by a misjudged detective. Fact-based drama, starring Mare Winningham, Felicity Huffman and Chelcie Ross(n).(n)

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson(n).(n)

programme.title: Losing Chase
programme.desc: An intimate and turbulent relationship develops between a woman recovering from a nervous breakdown and the housemaid employed to look after her. Drama, starring Helen Mirren, Kyra Sedgwick and Beau Bridges(n).(n)

programme.title: Homeless to Harvard: The Liz Murray Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the tale of a neglected child who overcame her poverty-stricken and traumatic beginnings to achieve her dream of academic success at the prestigious American university. Starring Thora Birch, Michael Riley, Robert Bockstael and Makyla Smith(n).(n)

programme.title: My Body, My Child
programme.desc: A middle-aged Catholic woman becomes pregnant, but her doctor refuses to believe her and prescribes drugs that have unforeseen effects on her unborn child. She must choose between continuing the pregnancy, knowing her baby will be born severely deformed, or having an abortion in defiance of her faith. Drama, starring Vanessa Redgrave and Jack Albertson(n).(n)

programme.title: A Case for Life
programme.desc: A woman discovers she is pregnant for the fifth time while suffering from a life-threatening illness, and must consider having an abortion - a dilemma made all the crueller by the fact that she is a passionate pro-life activist. Drama, starring Valerie Bertinelli, Mel Harris, Brian McNamara and William Bumiller(n).(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's latest assignment is Wally, a lovable elderly hobo and street puppeteer whose caring and good nature have made him, without him knowing, into an angel. Dick Van Dyke guest stars.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Gabe Wilson, an old friend of Mark's, tries to re-build his life after suffering a heart attack. He is reunited with his old flame, but finds out that the woman he once loved has changed.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly escorts a prisoner to jail, but finds his captive is being stalked by bounty hunters after the reward money.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A teacher believes that all children should get an education, but finds the parents of Dodge City do no agree. Guest starring John Vernon (National Lampoon's Animal House).

programme.title: For Love of Olivia
programme.desc: A small-town lawyer running for congress is blackmailed into defending a man accused of murder - and to make matters worse, his wife is harbouring a shocking secret. Thriller, starring Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Urich and Lonette McKee.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy raises money to save his newspaper by selling his land to a mining company, unaware of the damage the new owners will do to the environment.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob helps Ike fix his motorcycle, and wants to use it to enter a race, to Olivia's horror.

programme.title: Barabbas
programme.desc: Part one of two. The biblical tale of Barabbas, the Judean criminal whose life was spared in preference to the crucifixion of Jesus Christ. Based on the novel by Par Lagerkvist, and starring Billy Zane.

programme.title: Barabbas
programme.desc: Part two of two. The biblical tale of Barabbas, the Judean criminal who was spared execution, with Jesus Christ being crucified instead. Based on the novel by Par Lagerkvist, and starring Billy Zane.

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama. A couple search for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Kevin Dillon, Edward Asner and Dixie Carter.

programme.title: Ultimate Deception
programme.desc: A former US Navy Seal takes extreme and illegal measures to provide his infertile wife with a baby - but his behaviour puts their marriage in jeopardy and leaves her facing a stark choice. Thriller, starring Yasmine Bleeth, Richard Grieco, Robin Brule and Nola Augustston.

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.

programme.title: Ann Rule's The Stranger Beside Me
programme.desc: An aspiring crime reporter is hired to investigate a series of grisly, unsolved murders stretching from Utah to Seattle, only to discover the killer is one of her closest friends. Fact-based thriller, starring Bill Campbell, Barbara Hershey, Kevin Dunn and Suki Kaiser.

programme.title: Soldier's Girl
programme.desc: Some soldiers attend a drag show, and one of them ends up forming a relationship with a transsexual performer. One of his friends turns against him and begins stirring up hostility among the ranks. Their drill sergeant resolves to drive out the rumoured gay recruit, but some of the men take a more violent approach. Fact-based drama, starring Troy Garity and Lee Pace.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of two teenagers, and help them resolve their confidence issues concerning height before their senior prom(n).(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan is given the chance to return to Heaven if he completes one last assignment - persuading a film star's bitter daughter not to publish a scathing article about her mother(n).(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt finds an orphan lost on the prairie, and takes her to live with her only relative - an aunt who does not want her(n).(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Jed Hockett prepares for the wedding of his sons to the women they kidnapped - but the boys struggle with married life. Guest starring Harry Morgan (MASH) and William Katt (Carrie)(n).(n)

programme.title: In His Life: The John Lennon Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the singer who formed one half of the most successful and celebrated songwriting partnership of modern times. The film charts the musician's youth in Liverpool and his rise to fame with the Beatles, a group which redefined popular music during the 1960s, before recalling his solo career and tragic death outside his home in Manhattan. Starring Philip McQuillan, Blair Brown, Daniel McGowan and Jamie Glover(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An elderly relative comes to stay and annoys the family, who urge her to leave. When John-Boy learns she is dying, he decides she should spend her last days with them(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia realise their children are growing up, and that this Christmas may be the last with the whole family. However, a series of disasters threaten to keep them apart(n).(n)

programme.title: An Inconvenient Woman
programme.desc: Part one of two. A wealthy and married man falls for a waitress and showers her with gifts. When he dies the mistress causes a number of problems for the well-to-do family, prompting them to take drastic action. Starring Jason Robards, Jill Eikenberry and Rebecca De Mornay(n).(n)

programme.title: An Inconvenient Woman
programme.desc: Part two of two. A wealthy and married man falls for a waitress and showers her with gifts. When he dies the mistress causes a number of problems for the well-to-do family, prompting them to take drastic action. Starring Jason Robards, Jill Eikenberry and Rebecca De Mornay(n).(n)

programme.title: Before He Wakes
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about a greedy woman who marries and murders two wealthy husbands in succession, to acquire their fortunes, and almost succeeds in getting away scot-free. Starring Jaclyn Smith, Diana Scarwid, Hope Lange and Timothy Carhart(n).(n)

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon(n).(n)

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane(n).(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia(n).(n)

programme.title: Her Desperate Choice
programme.desc: A woman flees the authorities in an attempt to protect her daughter from the child's paedophile father and seeks the help of an underground organisation dedicated to protecting abused youngsters. Drama, with Kyle Secor, Faith Ford, Hanna R Hall and Nigel Bennett(n).(n)

programme.title: Field Punishment No 1
programme.desc: The New Zealand army forcibly transports 14 conscientious objectors to the European front lines during the First World War. The men struggle to cling to their principles through brutal treatment in a series of military prisons, mental hospitals and battlefields. Fact-based drama, starring Fraser Brown and Byron Coll(n).(n)

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A quirky comedy starring Bill Murray as a hedonistic war veteran, with a penchant for alcohol and gambling, who is entrusted with babysitting the 12-year-old boy next door. As the improbable pair develops a friendship both of them learn to grow up, in unexpected ways. Also stars Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Lake Hollywood
programme.desc: Confronted with a crisis involving one of their own, Ray and his team strategize on how to use art from the Kovitzsky gallery as leverage. Meanwhile, after Hector's wife informs him that she and their daughter are moving to escape the incest scandal, he reaches a breaking point and enlists Ray's help in fixing the situation.

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone.

programme.title: Deal
programme.desc: After twenty years away from the poker tables, a retired gambler gets back into the big time with an Ivy League-educated protege with dreams of taking his talents to Las Vegas. Bret Harrison, Burt Reynolds and Shannon Elizabeth star in this drama.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this acclaimed remake from director Jonathan Demme ("The Silence of the Lambs") as Ben Marco, a U.S. Army major whose foggy memories of a terrifying Gulf War incident threaten to unravel the political ambitions of Raymond Shaw (Liev Schreiber), a former sergeant under Marco's command. Meryl Streep, Jon Voight, Kimberly Elise, Jeffrey Wright and Vera Farmiga co-star in this taut thriller.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan.

Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver.

Andrei Finti and Marco Claudiu Pascu costar in this film festival favorite.

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: What would happen if a cosmic phenomenon of some kind brought every machine on planet Earth, from trucks and airplanes to electric carving knives and guns, to "life"? Stephen King ponders that very question with this sci-fi action-comedy, the author's directorial debut, starring Emilio Estevez, Pat Hingle, Laura Harrington and Yeardley Smith.

programme.title: Summer of Blood
programme.desc: A black comedy about a misanthropic, emotionally stunted New Yorker who finds himself on the brink of a premature mid-life crisis when he rejects his girlfriend's marriage proposal, but his luck changes one fateful night when he runs into a vampire and gets a second chance at life.

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people.

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio.

Jimmy Smits costars in this supernatural thriller from the director of "The Mask.

programme.desc: Jet Li stars in this action-packed sci-fi thriller as both predator and prey in the parallel universes that begin to collide when he destroys versions of himself in each alternate reality, until he must confront his final self.

programme.title: Venom (2005)
programme.desc: A pack of teenagers run for their lives through the swamps of Louisiana, as they are chased by a man possessed by 13 evil souls, who is relentless in his pursuit of new victims.

As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind.

programme.desc: A first year student at Oxford University is invited to join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single drunken, debauched and disturbing evening with dangerous consequences.

programme.title: The Discoverers

Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin.

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain

programme.title: Sister

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side.

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as an unorthodox and irreverent DJ who shakes things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam during the war but although he can keep the troops laughing, he can't keep out of trouble. Also stars Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion.

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n).(n)

programme.desc: Inspired by the Dominique Strauss-Kahn affair, Gerard Depardieu stars as a powerful French diplomat on a trip to New York City, whose debauched and dangerous behavior unleashes a scandal(n).(n)

programme.desc: Australian writer and director Yahoo Serious stars in this slapstick tale of an accident-prone obsessive-compulsive dismantler who tries to stop his evil company owner from adding nicotine to their egg product line(n).(n)

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Four best friends decide to recreate the greatest adventure of their lives, and walk the entire length of Manhattan in one last attempt to find the love and adventure from their glory days. Stars Adam Brody and Josh Lawson(n).(n)

programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren(n).(n)

programme.desc: Documentary featuring The Who's performance at Hyde Park as part of their 50th anniversary tour, as well as original interviews with Pete Townshend and Roger Daltrey reflecting on their lives together, plus others like Iggy Pop(n).(n)

programme.title: Springsteen & I
programme.desc: A unique music documentary celebrating 40 years of rock 'n' roll icon Bruce Springsteen. Working with the filmmakers, his fans have submitted clips to create a film that reflects on their personal insights and experiences, exploring what this timeless artist means to them. Combined with the never-before-seen archival footage of Bruce's performances throughout his career, and his incredible music, this is a film for the people, by the people(n).(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n).(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment(n).(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter(n).(n)

programme.title: Southpaw

But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n).(n)

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Judah vs. Malignaggi (R) (?)
Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: The eighth installment in the popular, long-running horror film series finds masked supernatural killer Michael Myers back to haunt his now-institutionalized sister (Jamie Lee Curtis) as well as the six teenagers spending the night in his family home as a reality-show Internet stunt. Busta Rhymes, Tyra Banks, Ryan Merriman, Thomas Ian Nicholas and Sean Patrick Thomas costar in this freaky follow-up from "Halloween 2" director Rick Rosenthal.

programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo.

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton.

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards� winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas.

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.

programme.title: Best of Showtime Boxing 2015
programme.desc: Hard-hitting retrospective of highlights from 2015's biggest knockouts and most exciting fights. Featuring Mayweather, Wilder, Broner, Chavez, Jacobs, Brook and more in huge bouts and emotional moments both in and out of the ring.

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton.

programme.title: Deal
programme.desc: After twenty years away from the poker tables, a retired gambler gets back into the big time with an Ivy League-educated protege with dreams of taking his talents to Las Vegas. Bret Harrison, Burt Reynolds and Shannon Elizabeth star in this drama.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider
programme.desc: When brilliant psychopath Gary Soneji (Michael Wincott) kidnaps the daughter of a U.S. senator, it's up to forensic psychologist Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) and FBI agent Jezzie Flannigan (Monica Potter) to find the ruthless criminal. It soon becomes clear that the kidnapping's a ruse, that Soneji has something far more sinister up his sleeve, and that he's getting help from within the government. Michael Moriarty, Penelope Ann Miller and Dylan Baker costar in this thrilling sequel to "Kiss the Girls.

programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott.

programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n).(n)

programme.desc: Documentary about legendary 1960s sexploitation director Joe Sarno and his loyal wife and collaborator Peggy Sarno. programme.title: Untamed Lust
programme.desc: A woman throws caution to the winds and runs off with a bad boy biker to have a fantasy-filled adventure with an unexpected twist(n).(n)

programme.desc: Documentary exploring the making of Nas' 1994 groundbreaking debut album Illmatic that follows the artist as he returns to his childhood home to share stories of his upbringing and influences and tracks the thrilling evolution from his life as a young street poet to a visionary MC. programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life.

programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood battles his terrible shyness as his father wages his own battle to throw a bar mitzvah party that will outdo his rival. But everything is upended when the boy's estranged grandfather arrives in town, in this satire of materialism.

This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments.

Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin(n).(n)

programme.desc: A pair of abused and neglected teenage girls are driven to an unthinkable crime when their mother's alcoholism and her string of abusive boyfriends leaves them no other choice. Stars Abigail Breslin and Mira Sorvino.

Pushed to their limits and facing storms, starvation, panic and despair, the survivors must resort to the unthinkable to stay alive. Their incredible tale ultimately inspires author Herman Melville to write ``Moby-Dick.'.

programme.desc: Disaster strikes on Aug. 5, 2010, as a copper and gold mine collapses in Chile, trapping 33 men underground. With more than 2,000 feet of rock in their way, members of a rescue team work tirelessly for 69 days to save the seemingly doomed crew. Beneath the rubble, the miners begin an epic quest to survive, contending with suffocating heat and the need for food and water. With family, friends and the rest of the world watching, it becomes a race against time and a true test of the human spirit.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Life has changed drastically for thunder buddies John, now a bachelor, and best pal Ted, now married to the woman of his dreams. Problems arise when the couple decide to adopt a child, but the law declares Ted to be property and not a person. Angry and dejected, the lovably foulmouthed teddy bear must now seek legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney to get the justice he deserves(n).(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Cop Harry Callahan attempts to track down a psychopathic rooftop killer before a kidnapped girl dies. When he is found Harry abuses the murderer's civil rights putting him back on the streets. Once he is released he hijacks a school bus and Harry must go after him again. The only way to stop this vicious killer is in cold blood(n).(n)

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: Peter and Rita immediately fall for each other and decide to get married. But during their wedding reception, a feeble old man asks Rita for a kiss. While nothing seems wrong at first, Peter soon realizes that the kiss caused Rita and the man to switch bodies. As he searches for a way to switch them back, Peter must face the dilemma of loving Rita in the body of a terminally ill man or staying married to a stranger posing as his wife(n).(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Cambridge University student and future physicist Stephen Hawking falls in love with fellow collegian Jane Wilde . At 21, Hawking learns that he has motor neuron disease. Despite this -- and with Jane at his side -- he begins an ambitious study of time, of which he has very little left, according to his doctor. He and Jane defy terrible odds and break new ground in the fields of medicine and science, achieving more than either could hope to imagine(n).(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Located off the coast of Costa Rica, the Jurassic World luxury resort provides a habitat for an array of genetically engineered dinosaurs, including the vicious and intelligent Indominus rex. When the massive creature escapes, it sets off a chain reaction that causes the other dinos to run amok. Now, it's up to a former military man and animal expert to use his special skills to save two young brothers and the rest of the tourists from an all-out, prehistoric assault(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer faces off with an old adversary during a talk show appearance; Ricky gets some bad news; Charles relishes his new status as a fan favorite(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer makes a play to poach a big client from Andre; Ricky considers where to head next; Reggie fights for what he is owed; Tracy takes a stand with her boss; Charles gets insights from his coach(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer advises Vernon to stay quiet; Spencer and Joe butt heads over advising a client; Ricky tours a potential new home(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Joe search for Andre's weakness; Vernon anxiously awaits news; Jason woos a client; Ricky attempts to understand his father; Charles gets the truth from Siefert(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer tries to mentor Travis while dodging unwelcome medical news; Reggie and Joe buy a wild gift in an attempt to cheer up Vernon; Ricky encourages Charles to stand up for himself(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer tries to broker peace between Travis and a critic; Charles is forced to deliver bad news; Joe encounters Andre; Ricky is thrown for a loop when Dennis decides to have more of a voice in his life(n).(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: After Andre makes a surprise visit to the office, Spencer scrambles to stay ahead; Joe discovers skeletons in his partner's closet; Ricky tries to make amends with Dennis; Charles plots to keep Ricky in Miami; Travis confides in Spencer(n).(n)

programme.title: Taking Lives
programme.desc: An insidious serial killer is impersonating his victims' identities as he travels across Canada. A recent spate of murders in Montreal has brought FBI Agent Illeana Scott north to investigate. Scott's unusual methods quickly earn the suspicion of the local police but bring her close to art dealer James Costa, who says he was an eyewitness to the latest murder. Sparks develop between the two as Costa's role becomes crucial in their effort to apprehend the killer(n).(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: When astronauts blast off from the planet Mars, they leave behind Mark Watney, presumed dead after a fierce storm. With only a meager amount of supplies, the stranded visitor must utilize his wits and spirit to find a way to survive on the hostile planet. Meanwhile, back on Earth, members of NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home, while his crew mates hatch their own plan for a daring rescue mission(n).(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.sub-title: Part 8: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Stone is thrust into the spotlight as a controversy involving the defense emerges(n).(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: An Irish immigrant in 1950s New York falls for a tough Italian plumber, but faces temptation from another man when she returns to her homeland for a visit(n).(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: When a handsome, charming teenager named Noah moves in next door, newly separated high-school teacher Claire Peterson encourages his friendship and engages in a little bit of harmless -- or so she thinks -- flirtation. Although Noah spends much of the time hanging out with Claire's son, the teen's attraction to her is palpable. One night, Claire gives in to temptation and lets Noah seduce her -- but when she tries to end the relationship, he turns violent(n).(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: After a year apart - attending different schools, meeting different people - the guys rent a beach house and vow to make this the best summer ever. As it turns out, whether that will happen or not has a lot to do with the girls. Between the wild parties, outrageous revelations and yes, a trip to band camp, they discover that times change and people change, but in the end, it's all about sticking together.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. It's up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: One-Night Stand
programme.desc: Louis C.K.

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: Jack is a straitlaced lawyer with a loving wife . Dale is suicidal about his stalled career as an artist. The only thing they have in common is Collette, with whom they both had an affair years ago. Unbeknownst to the two men, she had a son, Scott, who is now missing. After she tells Jack and Dale that one of them could be the father, the pair set out to find Scott and prove who the real father is.

programme.title: Life With Mikey
programme.desc: The former child star of a TV show meets a cute little waif who changes his talent agency and his life.

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: Nick Halloway is an average businessman who undergoes an extraordinary change when an experiment gone awry turns him invisible. Government operative David Jenkins discovers Nick in his see-through condition at the scene of the accident and arranges for him to be taken into custody, but he escapes. As Nick tries to find out more about his strange situation, he receives aid from Alice Monroe, a pretty acquaintance who helps him avoid capture.

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: When Xerxes, the evil god king of Persia, sends his massive army to Sparta, King Leonidas and 13 strapping warriors rise up to defend their homeland. Leonidas, Captain and the rest face down dancing Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes.

programme.title: State and Main
programme.desc: A big-budget movie crew descends upon a quaint New England village, sowing a bumper crop of corruption, vanity and greed in David Marnet's ``State and Main''; in the days that elapse before the cameras finally roll, money will change hands, careers will be jeopardized and love will blossom in the small-town soil.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: In this dark comedy, the crotchety Willie T. Stokes and his partner reunite once a year for a holiday con. Posing as a mall Santa and his elf, they rip off shopping outlets on Christmas Eve. This year, however, Willie is falling apart. He's depressed and alcoholic, and his erratic behavior draws the suspicion of mall security . But when befriending a small boy brings out his kinder side, Willie begins to wonder if there is still some hope for him.

programme.title: One-Night Stand
programme.desc: Flight of the Conchords.

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: Miss Mona runs the Chicken Ranch, a brothel with a long history in a small Texas town. The locals have a good relationship with the institution, and Mona is respected in the community. The sheriff, Ed Earl Dodd, also looks out for the Chicken Ranch due to his past with Miss Mona. However, when pious reporter Melvin Thorpe exposes the brothel, outside interests want it shut down, putting the governor in a tough spot.

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A secretly bisexual Brooklynite from a traditional Persian family struggles with her identity and the disintegration of her relationship with her girlfriend.

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Billionaire Edward Cole and car mechanic Carter Chambers are complete strangers, until fate lands them in the same hospital room. The men find they have two things in common: a need to come to terms with who they are and what they have done with their lives, and a desire to complete a list of things they want to see and do before they die. Against their doctor's advice, the men leave the hospital and set out on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: Always looking for action, five over-enthusiastic but under-stimulated Vermont State Troopers raise hell on the highway, keeping motorists anxiously looking in their rear-view mirrors. Between an ongoing feud with the local cops over whose you-know-what is bigger, and the state government wanting to shut them down, the ``Super Troopers'' find themselves precariously and hilariously heading toward calamity as they try to avoid extinction.

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: When Xerxes, the evil god king of Persia, sends his massive army to Sparta, King Leonidas and 13 strapping warriors rise up to defend their homeland. Leonidas, Captain and the rest face down dancing Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: In this dark comedy, the crotchety Willie T. Stokes and his partner reunite once a year for a holiday con. Posing as a mall Santa and his elf, they rip off shopping outlets on Christmas Eve. This year, however, Willie is falling apart. He's depressed and alcoholic, and his erratic behavior draws the suspicion of mall security . But when befriending a small boy brings out his kinder side, Willie begins to wonder if there is still some hope for him.

programme.title: Other People's Money
programme.desc: ''Larry the Liquidator'' Garfield is a corporate raider, deconstructing companies and selling off the parts for a profit. His new target is a small-town cable company that employs the majority of the town's residents. With everyone's livelihood depending on him, company chairman Andrew Jorgenson hires his sexy stepdaughter, Kate, to distract the ruthless raider. Larry takes the bait -- and soon finds that he must choose between Kate and money(n).(n)

programme.title: Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Comic Louis C.K. performs from the Fillmore Auditorium in San Francisco(n).(n)

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: After receiving a head injury on a case, private eye Maurice Pogue suffers from a form of amnesia in which his short-term memory is wiped clean every time he falls asleep. Besides experiencing some obvious problems in his profession, Pogue is also the key witness in an important case against a mobster accused of murder. Now, relying only on a cassette recorder to fill him in on a daily basis, Pogue has to not only testify at the trial, but also crack a big case(n).(n)

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Wrongly sentenced to life in prison, Jack Hammond manages to escape. He heads for Mexico, where he steals a car and takes the driver hostage. She happens to be an heiress named Natalie, and the ensuing police chase becomes a full-blown media event. With philosophical cops and the girl's rich dad in pursuit, Jack and Natalie begin to develop a relationship. However, Jack finds his predicament difficult to escape(n).(n)

programme.title: McHale's Navy
programme.desc: Shopkeeper McHale is called back to captain the PT-73 and save a Caribbean island from annihilation(n).(n)

programme.title: Bait Shop
programme.desc: The owner of a small-town bait shop competes in a fishing tournament for the prize money to save his business(n).(n)

programme.title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
High Fidelity
programme.desc: Rob Gordon is the owner of a failing record store in Chicago, where he sells music the old-fashioned way -- on vinyl. Although they have an encyclopedic knowledge of pop music and are consumed by the music scene, it's of no help to Rob, whose needle skips the love groove when his long-time girlfriend, Laura, walks out on him. As he examines his failed attempts at romance and happiness, the process finds him being dragged, kicking and screaming, into adulthood(n).(n)

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: Lanie Kerrigan, a feature reporter at a Seattle television station, leads the ultimate superficial life, even though she thinks she has it all, like a superstar boyfriend, a gorgeous apartment, and a shot at a big network assignment. Her perfect world starts unraveling after a homeless street seer tells Lanie that she leads a meaningless existence, and will die the following week. When the savant's other predictions come true, Lanie begins to re-examine her life and priorities(n).(n)

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: A coming-of-age romantic comedy set against the backdrop of the Cape Cod Baseball League. Local boy Ryan Dunne, now a pitcher for Boston College, meets Tenley Parrish, the daughter of a wealthy couple who summer on the Cape. Ryan and Tenley fall in love, much to the chagrin of their families, while Ryan clings to one last hope of being discovered and signed to a pro baseball contract(n).(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Frustrated at his own failures and disillusioned with professional sports, tennis player Peter Colt resolves to retire from competition and become an instructor at an exclusive private club. But when Colt receives a surprise wild-card berth in Wimbledon, he can't help but enter the tournament. Soon, Colt meets Lizzie Bradbury, a beautiful American tennis player with an upcoming match of her own, and finds the inspiration he hopes will turn his luck around(n).(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: A riotous and raunchy exploration of the most eagerly anticipated -- and most humiliating -- rite of adulthood, known as losing one's virginity. In this hilarious lesson in life, love and libido, a group of friends, fed up with their well-deserved reputations as sexual no-hitters, decide to take action(n).(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity

Although they have an encyclopedic knowledge of pop music and are consumed by the music scene, it's of no help to Rob, whose needle skips the love groove when his long-time girlfriend, Laura, walks out on him. As he examines his failed attempts at romance and happiness, the process finds him being dragged, kicking and screaming, into adulthood(n).(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: When President Ulysses S. Grant learns that diabolical inventor Dr. Arliss Loveless is planning to assassinate him, he orders Civil War hero James West and U.S. Marshal Artemus Gordon (also Kline) to arrest him. West's trigger-happy personality doesn't always mesh well with that of the thoughtful Gordon, but they manage to work together. And with the help of a mysterious stranger, West and Gordon close in on Loveless(n).(n)

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Follows the hilarious path of four African-American men as they take on love, sex, friendship and two of life's most terrifying prospects -- commitment and honesty. Lifelong friends banded together to weather love's innate terrors and occasional triumphs in this brazenly comic yet painfully true exploration of the battle between the sexes. Amidst the career track, basketball and bar hopping, ``The Brothers'' love women -- as many as possible -- but a shocking revelation tests their friendship(n).(n)

programme.title: Summer Catch

Ryan and Tenley fall in love, much to the chagrin of their families, while Ryan clings to one last hope of being discovered and signed to a pro baseball contract.

programme.title: The Man With One Red Shoe
programme.desc: As government official Cooper plays a nasty game of one-upsmanship with his rival in hopes of landing a promotion, he is deceived into believing that unassuming violinist Richard is involved in international espionage. Cooper sends his top operative, the gorgeous Maddy, to charm Richard into giving himself away. The naive musician, however, is completely clueless about political intrigue and, sadly, believes he has met the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Miss You Can Do It
programme.desc: Abbey Curran, the first woman with cerebral palsy to compete in a Miss USA Pageant, creates a pageant specifically for girls with special needs.

programme.desc: The tale of Hans Christian Andersen's tiny heroine is moved to a Brazilian rain forest. With the voices of Rosie Perez, Bronson Pinchot and Edward James Olmos.

programme.title: Hotel for Dogs
programme.desc: After moving into a foster home that forbids pets, siblings Andi and Bruce must quickly find a home for their dog, Friday. The resourceful pair find an abandoned hotel, and with the help of Bruce's mechanical skills, turn it into a pooch paradise for Friday and a number of strays. But when the inevitable barking makes neighbors suspicious, Andi and Bruce must find a way to hide their canine haven from prying eyes.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Mumble, a young emperor penguin, lives in Antarctica. Like others of his kind, he needs to be able to sing to attract a mate, but he has a terrible voice. Instead, Mumble must express himself, and lure a female through his amazing talent for tap-dancing.

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: Teenager Jerrica is an extremely shy but talented singer-songwriter whose dreams of stardom come true when she forms the group Jem and the Holograms. Other members include her younger sister Kimber on keyboards, drummer Shana and bassist Aja . With help from Rio, the son of the CEO of Starlight Music, the four young band members find their own voice while taking the world by storm.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: E.B. White's beloved children's tale is brought to life in this animated film, which finds the young farm pig Wilbur attempting to avoid a dire fate. Of all the barnyard creatures, Wilbur's staunchest ally is Charlotte, a thoughtful spider who devises an intriguing plan to keep the gentle little swine out of the slaughterhouse. Although Charlotte's efforts, which involve words written in her delicate web, seem far-fetched, they may just work.

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: Fourteen year old, hoops-loving Calvin Cambridge has a dream: to be a famous basketball player -- to mix it up among the NBA's greatest. But in a game dominated by giants with unparalleled athletic abilities, Calvin's diminutive stature and limited skills, make this a far-off fantasy. Or is it? After he laces up a mysterious pair of old sneakers inscribed with the faded initials MJ, Calvin makes the leap from playground hijinks to NBA superstardom.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as Russ Duritz, a successful image consultant whose life is suddenly turned upside down when he magically meets Rusty, Russ himself as an 8-year-old kid. Rusty is a sweet, but slightly geeky, awkward little kid who painfully reminds Russ of everything he hated about himself when he was a child-a pudgy, little cry-baby who was the daily victim of the school bullies-an image Russ has worked hard to overcome and consciously forget(n).(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Master chef Kate Armstrong runs her life and her kitchen with intimidating intensity. However, a recipe for disaster may be in the works when she becomes the guardian of her young niece while crossing forks with the brash sous-chef who just joined her staff. Though romance blooms in the face of rivalry, Kate needs to look outside the kitchen to find true happiness(n).(n)
